snippet: Joan Rivers, who is the president of her building’s board, is one of the rare celebrities to take on what many call a thankless task.
abstract: Elizabeth A Harris The Appraisal column; comedian Joan Rivers is the president of her Upper East Side condominium's board, making her one of the rare celebrities to take on what many call a thankless task.
lead_paragraph: Joan Rivers, who is the president of her building’s board, is one of the rare celebrities to take on what many call a thankless task.

headline.print_headline: For Comedian, Leading Her Condo Board Is a Serious Matter
headline.seo: For Joan Rivers, Role on Condo Board a Serious Matter
headline.main: For Comedian, Leading Her Condo Board Is a Serious Matter
